name: The Meadowlands
description:
In the Meadowlands you can explore the nature, collect resources and share them with others! Helping others will not go unnoticed as you'll get gifts and most importantly - new friends.
------------
Controls:
WASD - walk
LMB - use items
RMB - give item to a character
Mouse scroll wheel or 1, 2, 3... - change items in inventory
E - pick up an item
R - drop an item
I - open or close inventory

Other characters will have an item preference. In order to befriend them, you'll have to find what items they like.

------------
Feeling the sense of belonging and the ability to make new bonds in a game relieves stress tremendously. Having the ability to connect with anyone without having to worry about the exhausting difficulty level of survival game will help the player relax.
------------
Team members:
